Fort Mill woman killed in Rock Hill crash ... 22 PM ROCK HILL, S.C. (WBTV) - A woman killed in a crash in Rock Hill Saturday has been identified by officials as 75-year-old Donnis Martin of Fort Mill. The crash happened on Celanese Road. Officials say Martin was driving when her car went off the road and struck a tree. She was pronounced dead at the scene. Anyone with additional information is asked to call 803-909-8400 ... .
